entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
